Audience Matrix

SCALE: 1–3 Designers who code Designers Developers Employers [Score] Section

Content Creation

About

  • just write a two sentence bio. how hard could that be?
  • photo

Web Experiements

  • extract project work
  • try new things
  • post to code pen
  • embed here

speaking promotion

  • create page
  • list talks
  • link to talks
  • embed or link to videos
  • link to slides

video tutorials

  • page for each existing video
  • create videos for new experients

portfolio

  • show each project - clean, direct
  • show best aspects of each

blog posts

  • keep the ability to post text
  • won't be doing much writing

open source projects

  • list, describe, and link to projects

contact

  • contact form

<h1>Content Creation</h1>

<h2>About</h2>

<ul>
  <li>just write a two sentence bio. how hard could that be?</li>
  <li>photo</li>
</ul>

<h2>Web Experiements</h2>
<ul>
  <li>extract project work</li>
  <li>try new things</li>
  <li>post to code pen</li>
  <li>embed here</li>
</ul>

<h2>speaking promotion</h2>

<ul>
  <li>create page</li>
  <li>list talks</li>
  <li>link to talks</li>
  <li>embed or link to videos</li>
  <li>link to slides</li>
</ul>

<h2>video tutorials</h2>
<ul>
  <li>page for each existing video</li>
  <li>create videos for new experients</li>
</ul>

<h2>portfolio</h2>

<ul>
  <li>show each project - clean, direct</li>
  <li>show best aspects of each</li>
</ul>

<h2>blog posts</h2>

<ul>
  <li>keep the ability to post text</li>
  <li>won't be doing much writing</li>
</ul>

<h2>open source projects</h2>

<ul>
  <li>list, describe, and link to projects</li>
</ul>

<h2>contact</h2>

<ul>
  <li>contact form</li>
</ul>

                    <h1>Art Direction</h1>

concepts:

- fully black & white
- lots of woodgrain
- abstract wood grain illustration
- geometric
- fun photo of me
